ch.ethz.csb.youscope.shared.configuration
Interface JobContainerConfiguration

All Known Implementing Classes:
CompositeJobConfigurationDTO, MicroplateMeasurementConfigurationDTO, MultiPositionJobConfigurationDTO, ScriptingJobConfigurationDTO, StatisticsJobConfigurationDTO, TaskConfigurationDTO, ZSlidesJobConfigurationDTO
public interface JobContainerConfiguration

Interface each job configuration should implement which contains sub-jobs. By implementing this interface one accepts the contract that each job created by the respective configuration also implements the JobContainer interface. Implementing this interface allows for configuration validity checks and enables to use several UI elements.

Author:
Moritz Lang

addJob

void addJob(JobConfigurationDTO job,
            int index)
Adds a job to the job list. The job is added such that it has the given index. Jobs having a higher or equal index before the operation are moved downwards.

Parameters:
job - Job to be added.
index - Index where the job should be added.

clearJobs

void clearJobs()
Removes all jobs from the job list.
